oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Catholic Hour - 1948-05-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC program The Catholic Hour, originally broadcast May 2, 1948, part 2. Hosted by Walter Linthicum, with an address by Reverend James D. O'Shea, music directed by Father Eugene Walsh of the Sulpician Fathers, and organist Norman Lee Sidner.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Address by Reverend James D. O'Shea -- Walter Linthicum introduces the choir -- Christus Factus Est -- Walter Linthicum reads a prayer -- Crown Him With Many Crowns -- Closing statement (Walter Linthicum) -- Theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; Catholic hour (Radio program); Walsh, Eugene A. (Eugene Aloysius), 1911-1989
